thread.title: 'Majority of vehicles are going to be electric' within 15 years, Joe Biden says in Detroit
thread.title_full: 'Majority of vehicles are going to be electric' within 15 years, Joe Biden says in Detroit

author: Dana Afana | dafana@mlive.com
title: 'Majority of vehicles are going to be electric' within 15 years, Joe Biden says in Detroit
text: Vice President Joe Biden surprised crowds at the North American International Auto Show on Tuesday, touring Big 3 displays at the annual Detroit exhibition.
